entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
  • IDE features don't work with collection expressions + target-typed new #71238
  • MetadataImageReference.Display is used in diagnostics and has localizable resources #71236
    Backlog
  • `IDE0300` is reported twice #71234
  • Version 4.9.x packages missing on Nuget Gallery #71226
  • "Implement abstract class" should add the right generic constraint when a parameter is covariant in T? and constrained to be a subtype #71225
  • Elide MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable when spread in a collection expression #71223

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34412.76 #71239
  • Switch to file-scoped-namespaces in generated syntax files. #71192
  • Unexpected CS8602 generated in local function after update to VS 17.8 #70856
    17.9
  • When will this be fixed? It is extremely annoying! #71231
  • Wrong handling of readonly field in ref struct which holds another ref struct #71144
  • C# formatting rules should have a "do not enforce" option #71218
  • IDE0055 triggered on no space after spread operator #71219
  • Collection expressions: align `ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind()` with conversions specification #70880
    17.10
  • Compiler is too strict with its requirements for collection-expression code-gen when targeting an interface. #71054
  • ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync failing on latest scouting queue updated to 17.9 P1 #71088
    17.9 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass in helixApiAccessToken when available #71235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore using dotnet CLI to ensure NuGet environment variables are used #71233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use NetCurrent instead of net8.0 #71229
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement language version check. #71228
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use compile-time expression for SkipApplyOptimizationData in yml #71221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Restore using dotnet CLI to ensure NuGet environment variables are used #71237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix BuildHost in Source Build #71215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use file scoped namespaces #71193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove methods not used by F# #71232
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Don't copy test results to helix upload root. #71212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Enable skipped tests (rename and extract methods) #71213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix infinite loop in tagging #71224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix option code #71222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Rename automatic restore requests to be more explicit #71104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Code Actions not applied when LSP editor is enabled #71077
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
